title: Emphasis
$comment:
Analogues of `Delete` in other schema include:
  - HTML [`<em>`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/em)
  - JATS XML [`<italic>`](https://jats.nlm.nih.gov/archiving/tag-library/1.1/element/italic.html)
  - MDAST [`Emphasis`](https://github.com/syntax-tree/mdast#emphasis)
  - Pandoc [`Emph`](https://github.com/jgm/pandoc-types/blob/1.17.5.4/Text/Pandoc/Definition.hs#L256)

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

min.description: Generate a single fixed text value.

low.description: Generate a single arbitrary, non-recursive, inline node

high.description: Generate up to two arbitrary, non-recursive, inline nodes

max.description: Generate up to four arbitrary, non-recursive, inline nodes
